changelog: ðŸ§  CRITICAL FIX: Context Retention Restored - Fixed AI amnesia issue where chat forgot previous messages in same conversation. Root cause: useMessages hook only sent current message, not full history. Fixed by sending complete conversation history from frontend. Removed redundant truncated history from system prompt (~500 token savings). Increased history limit from 15 to 20 messages. AI now properly remembers context across multi-turn conversations. Generated comprehensive PERFORMANCE_OPTIMIZATION_REPORT.md analyzing the 'went too hard on optimization' issue.

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
